function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"LEED not primarily targeting design innovations for stopping virus propagation","Impact":"Failure to address virus propagation risks in building design","Mitigation":"Include specific design innovations to prevent virus propagation in building construction","Technologies":"Incorporation of antimicrobial materials, ventilation systems, and air purification technologies","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Architects, designers, LEED administrators"},{"Description":"Efficiency in cleaning coronavirus not thoroughly addressed in LEED Pilot Credit","Impact":"Failure to effectively mitigate virus spread through cleaning and disinfecting practices","Mitigation":"Enhance the pilot credit to include specific guidelines for cleaning coronavirus and assessing cleaning product effectiveness","Technologies":"Use of EPA-approved disinfectants, ultraviolet light, and other proven cleaning technologies","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff","Owner":"LEED administrators, building management"},{"Description":"Indoor air quality and VOC reduction not fully addressing virus propagation risks","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread due to inadequate indoor air quality control","Mitigation":"Enhance LEED credits to include specific requirements for virus-resistant air filtration and ventilation systems","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI), and increased ventilation rates","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Architects, designers, LEED administrators"}]}
